name: Clash: Robot Detective
description:
A relaxing time on a high-tech cruise ship turns into a mystery for the ages!  The robot staff onboard the Violet Skies have been getting hacked by a mysterious third party.  You are hired by Clash, a sentient robotic police assistant robot, to find whoever is responsible before it is too late.  

Crack the case with Clash, the robot detective!

  • Mystery sci-fi visual novel based on the dev's surreal dreams
  • Build your good cop/bad cop points
  • Choose between friendly, compassionate, indifferent, and hostile approaches
  • Your decisions and attitude affect Clash's demeanor and the perpetrator's identity
  • Speech checks to test your stats!
  • 21 achievements available to collect!
  • Featuring photography from Unsplash.com
  • Featuring sound effects from Zapsplat.com
  • Featuring music by Alexander Nakarada
